name: ORBIT AR
description:
The first real 3D Black Hole ever in a game!

Augmented Reality Space Game:
When space is our only chance to survive, we need to explore our solar system, in this augmented reality (AR) space simulation game, in a hope we're gonna have the answers to save our species from impending extinction.
There's someone or something out there who left clues and ways for us to contact, but why?
Do we wanna know?
We have no choice, WE HAVE TO KNOW!

=========

VISUALLY STUNNING

You're gonna feel like a live IMAX movie theater experience.
We pushed AR its boundaries in this game with the perfect balance between, cinematic graphics and best performance.

INNOVATIVE CAMERA SYSTEM

Our innovative camera system is like nothing in AR so far. Change perspective, yet, but it's still gonna work and feel as the default AR camera (device live camera). No spoilers here. Just download this game and you'll be stunned.

3D SPATIAL AUDIO

In this game, space speaks with you. Your position in the real world affects the audio you hear. Just like in real life, you can hear your surroundings. You can listen to "see with your ears" where a strange object is, maybe orbiting close to you. Maybe an explosion nearby. You have to listen to space.


IT'S JUST THE BEGINNING

This is just the beginning. We plan on expanding the game in future update, with new stages and features. And you will get it without the need to pay more for it.

========

**If you enjoying playing the game, please consider leaving a review on the App Store. We really appreciate it!**
